Package org.jcsp.net.settings

This package is used internally by the JCSP network infrastructure to load XML configuration files and represent their structure.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Req A system requirement.
XMLConfigConstants Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to define the XML configuration names.
 

Class Summary
Address Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a single address.
Addresses Unsed internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a set of addresses.
AddressSetting Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent an address setting.
ConfigReader Used internally by the JCSP network infrastructure to load a configuration from an XML file.
ConnectionOriented Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a connection oriented protocol.
JCSPConfig Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent the overall configuration.
LinkProfile Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a single link profile.
LinkProfiles Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a set of link profiles.
MaxPing Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a maximum ping rate.
MaxSpeed Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a maximum speed.
Memory Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a memory value.
MinMemory Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a minimum memory setting.
MinSpeed Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a minimum speed setting.
NodeProfile Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a node profile.
NodeProfiles Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a set of node profiles.
OtherSpec Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent misellaneous specifications.
Plugin Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a plug-in.
Plugins Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a set of plug-ins.
Protocol Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a single protocol.
Protocols Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a set of protocols.
Reliable Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a reliable protocol.
ReqProtocol Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a protocol requirement.
Service Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a service.
Services Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a set of services.
Setting Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a system setting.
Settings Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a set of system settings.
Spec Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a set of system specifications.
Specs Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a set of system specifications.
Wireless Used internally within the JCSP network infrastructure to represent a wireless protocol.
 

Exception Summary
ConfigReader.XMLValidationException Thrown in the event of a semantic error in the parsed XML file.
 

Package org.jcsp.net.settings Description

This package is used internally by the JCSP network infrastructure to load XML configuration files and represent their structure. It is not intended for use and so minimal documentation is supplied.
